summary.para: Sets the border mode to use with the effect.

param.name: borderMode
param.para: Specifies the border mode to use with the effect.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the interpolation mode of the effect.

param.name: interpolationMode
param.para: Specifies the interpolation mode of the effect.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the sharpness of the effect.

param.name: sharpness
param.para: Specifies the sharpness of the effect.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the sharpness of the effect.

param.name: animation
param.para: An animation that represents how the sharpness value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the transform matrix of the effect.

param.name: transformMatrix
param.para: Specifies the transform matrix for the effect to use.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets an element of the transform matrix of the effect.

param.name: value
param.para: The new value of the element.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets an element of the transform matrix of the effect.

param.name: animation
param.para: An animation that represents how the element value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The arithmetic composite effect is used to combine 2 images using a weighted sum of pixels from the input images.
